mapper.insert: insert into program_card (card_id, trainer_id, date, duration, trainee_id, status, session_focus_1, session_focus_2) values (#{cardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trainerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{traineeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sessionFocus1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sessionFocus2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update program_card set trainer_id = #{trainerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, date = #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, trainee_id = #{traineeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, session_focus_1 = #{sessionFocus1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, session_focus_2 = #{sessionFocus2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select card_id, trainer_id, date, duration, trainee_id, status, session_focus_1, session_focus_2 from program_card where card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select card_id, trainer_id, date, duration, trainee_id, status, session_focus_1, session_focus_2 from program_card
